title: r/Entitledparents Psycho Karen Keys My Car, Gets ARRESTED!
description:
r/Entitledparents While learning how to drive stick shift, OP catches the attention of the neighborhood Karen, who decides to launch a one-woman war against OP for daring to drive a loud car. Things eventually escalate and Karen keys the car, causing $60,000 in damage! OP and her brother call the cops, who instantly arrest Karen for vandalism! If you like this content, be sure to subscribe for more daily Reddit episodes!
